title: Animo Juice
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Juice bar, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Offers many vegan options, including at least one soup daily. Any juice bar item can be made vegan. Protein blends can be made with soymilk or almond milk. Burritos use organic pinto beans and brown rice; order without cheese. All salads can be made vegan. Can add quinoa to soup or salad. Quick bite vegan options are hummus and vegetables, apples and peanut butter and tortilla chips and guacamole.
